tokens.text: validates that content does not use beta features flags

title: Beta Features
description: Validates that add-on content does not use beta features flags. The 'use_beta_features' property is not allowed in entity, block, or item behavior definitions for published content. This validator scans manifest files and custom definition JSON files to detect usage of beta feature flags.

fields.title: File Read Error
fields.description: The validator was unable to read the file contents. This may indicate a corrupted file, encoding issues, or file system permissions problems. Ensure the file is accessible and properly formatted.
fields.howToUse: Check file permissions and ensure the file isn't locked by another program. If the file appears corrupted, try restoring from backup or recreating it.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the file path that could not be read

fields.title: JSON Parse Error
fields.description: The file contains invalid JSON syntax and could not be parsed. Check for missing commas, unquoted strings, trailing commas, or other JSON syntax errors. Use a JSON validator to identify the exact location of the error.
fields.howToUse: Use a JSON validator or editor with JSON syntax highlighting to find errors. Common issues: missing commas, unquoted strings, or trailing commas before closing brackets.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the JSON parse error message

fields.title: Beta Features Flag
fields.description: The 'use_beta_features: true' property was found in an entity, block, or item behavior definition. Beta features are experimental and not allowed in published add-on content. Remove the 'use_beta_features' property or set it to false.
fields.howToUse: Remove the 'use_beta_features' property from your entity, block, or item definition, or set it to false. Beta features cannot be used in published content.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the file path where beta features flag was found
